books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Dinesh D'Souza
books.description: A defense of America against the view that its power in the world should be diminished; also a documentary film.
books.name: AMERICA

books.author: by Todd Burpo with Lynn Vincent
books.description: A 3-year-old’s encounter with Jesus during an appendectomy; the basis of the movie.
books.name: HEAVEN IS FOR REAL

books.author: by Ronald Kessler
books.description: A reporter divulges details from Secret Service agents about the lives of presidents, ex-presidents and candidates, as well as about the service’s failings.
books.name: THE FIRST FAMILY DETAIL

books.author: by Hampton Sides
books.description: An 1879 polar voyage gone terribly wrong.
books.name: IN THE KINGDOM OF ICE

books.author: by Piper Kerman
books.description: A Brooklyn woman’s prison memoir. The basis for the Netflix series, originally published in 2010.
books.name: ORANGE IS THE NEW BLACK

books.author: by Richard Preston
books.description: The discovery of the Ebola virus, and the efforts to keep it from spreading; first published in 1994.
books.name: THE HOT ZONE

books.author: by Ben Macintyre
books.description: An account of the British Cold War spy Kim Philby focuses on the two close friends whose trust he betrayed.
books.name: A SPY AMONG FRIENDS

books.author: by Rick Perlstein
books.description: Society and politics in America from 1973 to 1976, the years between Nixon’s resignation and the beginning of Ronald Reagan’s ascent.
books.name: THE INVISIBLE BRIDGE

books.author: by David McCullough
books.description: A history of the creation of the Panama Canal; first published in 1977.
books.name: THE PATH BETWEEN THE SEAS

books.author: by Ben Carson with Candy Carson
books.description: Carson, a retired pediatric neurosurgeon, now a Fox News contributor, offers solutions to problems in health and education based on capitalism, not government.
books.name: ONE NATION

books.author: by Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: Why some people succeed; from the author of "Blink" and "The Tipping Point."
books.name: OUTLIERS

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail during the summer of 1995.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Derek Hough
books.description: A memoir and advice from the dancer, a “Dancing With the Stars” regular.
books.name: TAKING THE LEAD
